attributes.action: We want our hot summers back
attributes.additional_details:
"Old Style Hot summers !!

We all need to act together, to get our climate back to the way it was !

Stop all this recycling nonsense, it's not helping !

Use as many plastic carriers, as you possibly can !

Ditch the roll on deodorants, and go back to those CFC sprays !

Nothing's renewable, apart from your Tax Disc, and your TV license, otherwise a crock 'o' ....!

And don't forget to remove the catalytic converter, from your cars !

You know it makes sense !!"

So what happened to Global Warming?

They won't call it Global Warming because the earth isn't warming up!

So they now call the biggest tax scam in the memory of man Climate change!!
